title: Scheduled Annual Maintenance Due
description: Annual preventive maintenance is due for Smart Pump SP-500. This includes inspection of seals, bearing check, vibration analysis, and performance verification as per maintenance schedule.

title: Abnormal Vibration Detected
description: IoT sensors detected abnormal vibration patterns (12mm/s peak, threshold 8mm/s) indicating potential bearing wear. Immediate inspection recommended to prevent unplanned downtime.

notes.author: Hans Weber
notes.text: Initial inspection completed. Confirmed elevated vibration levels. Ordering replacement bearings SKF 6205-2RS.

notes.author: Hans Weber
notes.text: Parts ordered, expected delivery Jan 12. Pump operating within acceptable limits but monitoring closely.

title: Flow Sensor Calibration Required
description: Quarterly calibration of flow sensor required per quality management procedure QMP-2024-07. Last calibration: October 2024.

notes.author: Quality Team
notes.text: On hold pending completion of urgent vibration repair (SR-2025-002). Will reschedule after pump is fully operational.

title: Seal Replacement - Minor Leak Detected
description: Minor leak detected at mechanical seal during routine inspection. Seal replacement completed successfully.

notes.author: Maintenance Team Alpha
notes.text: Leak confirmed. Ordered new mechanical seal (John Crane Type 2100).

notes.author: Maintenance Team Alpha
notes.text: Seal replacement completed. Pump tested - no leaks detected. Performance verified.

title: Quarterly Safety Inspection
description: Completed Q4 2024 safety inspection including guards, emergency stops, warning labels, and grounding verification.

notes.author: Safety Inspector Team
notes.text: All safety checks passed. Next inspection due Q1 2025. Report filed: SI-2024-Q4-042.
